title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8195-1.1 - County advisory appraisals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8195-1.1 - County advisory appraisals

State Regulations
(a) Advisory appraisals performed by a county
shall be done in the same manner as advisory appraisals performed by the State
pursuant to Subpart 8195-2 of this Part, insofar as practicable. (b) County appraisal personnel shall satisfy
the minimum qualification standards for real property appraiser set forth in

Subpart 8188-5 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8195-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
